snippet: Scott Walker, who has emerged as a leading voice in the Republican Party after becoming the nation's first governor to survive a recall, said Mr. Romney needed to broaden his appeal beyond Republicans to carry Wisconsin in November.
abstract: Scott Walker, who has emerged as a leading voice in the Republican Party after becoming the nation's first governor to survive a recall, said Mr. Romney needed to broaden his appeal beyond Republicans to carry Wisconsin in November.

headline.main: Romney Should Hone Economic Message, Walker Says
